title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for a definite integral of ∫ a b ( r( θ ) ) 2  dθ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaamaabm aabaGaamOCamaabmaabaGaeqiUdehacaGLOaGaayzkaaaacaGLOaGa ayzkaaWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaOGaaGPaVlaadsgacqaH4oqCaS qaaiaadggaaeaacaWGIbaaniabgUIiYdaaaa@47CF@ with any limits of integration. Degree mode: A response that presents answers obtained by using a calculator in degree mode does not earn the first point it would have otherwise earned. The response is generally eligible for all subsequent points (unless no answer is possible in degree mode, or the question is made simpler by using degree mode). In degree mode, the area is 6.809. title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned by either dr dθ  ⋅  dθ dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaads gacaWGYbaabaGaamizaiabeI7aXbaacaaMe8oeaaaaaaaaa8qacqGH flY1caaMe8+damaalaaabaGaamizaiabeI7aXbqaaiaadsgacaWG0b aaaaaa@47B1@ or ( 0.927045 )( 1.6 ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaqadaqaaiaaic dacaGGUaGaaGyoaiaaikdacaaI3aGaaGimaiaaisdacaaI1aaacaGL OaGaayzkaaWaaeWaaeaacaaIXaGaaiOlaiaaiAdaaiaawIcacaGLPa aacaGGUaaaaa@44D2@ Note that ( 0.927045 )( 1.6 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaqadaqaaiaaic dacaGGUaGaaGyoaiaaikdacaaI3aGaaGimaiaaisdacaaI1aaacaGL OaGaayzkaaWaaeWaaeaacaaIXaGaaiOlaiaaiAdaaiaawIcacaGLPa aaaaa@4420@ would earn the first 2 points.

If dr dθ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaads gacaWGYbaabaGaamizaiabeI7aXbaaaaa@3D8D@ is incorrect (including the case of a potential chain rule error), then the response is eligible for the chain rule point, provided a value of or expression for the identified dr dθ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaads gacaWGYbaabaGaamizaiabeI7aXbaaaaa@3D8D@ is multiplied by dθ dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaads gacqaH4oqCaeaacaWGKbGaamiDaaaaaaa@3D8F@ or 1.6. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIXaGaaiOlai aaiAdacaGGUaaaaa@3BDD@ In this case, the incorrect dr dθ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaads gacaWGYbaabaGaamizaiabeI7aXbaaaaa@3D8D@ must be labeled.

If the presented value of dr dt  |  θ= 3π/  5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaabcaqaamaala aabaGaamizaiaadkhaaeaacaWGKbGaamiDaaaacaaMi8oacaGLiWoa daWgaaWcbaGaaGjcVlabeI7aXjabg2da9maalyaabaGaaG4maiabec 8aWbqaaiaayIW7caaI1aaaaaqabaaaaa@4950@ is positive, the interpretation must include “rate at which particle is moving away from the origin” to earn the third point.

If the presented value of dr dt  |  θ= 3π/  5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaabcaqaamaala aabaGaamizaiaadkhaaeaacaWGKbGaamiDaaaacaaMi8oacaGLiWoa daWgaaWcbaGaaGjcVlabeI7aXjabg2da9maalyaabaGaaG4maiabec 8aWbqaaiaayIW7caaI1aaaaaqabaaaaa@4950@ is negative, the interpretation must include “rate at which particle is moving toward the origin” and “rate of |  the presented value  | MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaabdaqaaiaayI W7caqG0bGaaeiAaiaabwgacaqGGaGaaeiCaiaabkhacaqGLbGaae4C aiaabwgacaqGUbGaaeiDaiaabwgacaqGKbGaaeiiaiaabAhacaqGHb GaaeiBaiaabwhacaqGLbGaaGjcVdGaay5bSlaawIa7aaaa@5063@ ” (or equivalent) to earn the third point.

Note that the interpretation that the particle is getting farther away from the origin is valid because we know both that r>0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbi aadkhacqGH+aGpcaaIWaaaaa@3BD6@ and that dr dt >0. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaads gacaWGYbaabaGaamizaiaadshaaaGaeyOpa4JaaGimaiaac6caaaa@3F44@

Degree mode: dr dθ =0.0513,  dr dt =0.0821 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWcaaqaaiaads gacaWGYbaabaGaamizaiabeI7aXbaacqGH9aqpcaaIWaGaaiOlaiaa icdacaaI1aGaaGymaiaaiodacaGGSaGaaGPaVpaalaaabaGaamizai aadkhaaeaacaWGKbGaamiDaaaacqGH9aqpcaaIWaGaaiOlaiaaicda caaI4aGaaGOmaiaaigdaaaa@4E62@ (See degree mode statement in part (a).)
